definitions.definition: Capable of being vacated ; liable to be annulled or made invalid ; voidable .
Capable of being avoided , shunned , or escaped .
examples: The minister confessed that many of the deaths were avoidable .

main_definition: Capable of being vacated ; liable to be annulled or made invalid ; voidable .
secondary_definitions: Capable of being avoided , shunned , or escaped .
